com.usamd.controller

Class DoctorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.usamd.controller.AbstractController
      • com.usamd.controller.DoctorController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoggerInterface

    @Controller
public class DoctorController
extends AbstractController
    The Class DoctorController handles all the request for Doctor and health center modules like Add/Search/Edit/Delete and Locate Doctor and Health Centers.
    Author:
    USAWebMD

                                                                                                            org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        This controller method saves the doctor information added from the Add Doctor Page.
